EmailTemplate.subject: Oops - please disregard any new Task Notifications you may have received today from Salesforce.com
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We are completing the load of your Account and Opportunity information to Saleforce.com and may have accidentally assigned you a task...or twelve! If we did, please accept my sincere apology and please disregard any task notifications received from Salesforce.com today.
For reference, an example of one of these accidentally sent task notification emails is below.
Kind Regards, {!User.FirstName}
-----Original Message----- From: no-reply@salesforce.com [mailto:no-reply@salesforce.com] On Behalf Of Tom Seibert Sent: Monday, July 12, 2010 1:51 PM To: {!Contact.LastName}, {!Contact.FirstName} Subject: Schedule Initial Appointment
